title: Delightful 2 bed / 1 bath in Jonesboro. 950 Sq Ft. Great value!
neighborhood: 15 Minute Drive to Newman Wetlands Center
posting_body: ['Welcome to Oak Run Apartment Homes!', '7878 N Main St Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'Rental Size:', '2 BR - 1 BA - 950 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1262 - $1528 |', 'Lease Length:', '13-Month', 'show contact info', 'Here at Oak Run Apartments, we offer two-bedroom homes that are spacious and affordable.', 'Each apartment has a large private patio, a walk-in closet in the master bedroom, and a laundry room equipped with full-size washer and dryer connections.', 'As a resident of Oak Run, you will also be able to take advantage of our property pool, 24-hour emergency maintenance, and professionally maintained landscaping!', 'Our community features:', '➢ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '➢ Grill', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Sparkling Pool', '➢ Sundeck', '➢', 'Well Equipped Playground', '➢ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '➢ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '➢ Convenient to Schools, Hospital & Medical Facilities', '➢ Easy Access to Airport & Interstate Highways', '➢ Easy Access to Bus Line', '➢', 'Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '➢ Minutes from Southlake Mall & Shopping On Mt. Zion Road', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Resident Referral Program', 'Our unit features:', '➢ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Fully Equipped Kitchen', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Mini Blinds & Verticals', '➢ Office', '➢ Range', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Wall to Wall Carpeting', '➢ Balcony/Patio', '➢ Bright White Kitchen Cabinets', '➢ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '➢ Designer Wallpaper Borders*', '➢ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '➢ Split Bath/Vanity Area', '➢ Vinyl Flooring', '➢ Walk-In Closets', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Window Coverings', 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Property Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '27EC866414394923']
